00024 typedef struct {
00025   int A;
00026   double q[3];
00027 } quadrupolepara;

00029 
00030 static void ob_qdiag(const SlaterDet* Q,
00031                      const Gaussian*G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00032                      const GaussianAux* X, 
00033                      complex double q[3])
00034 {
00035   int A=Q->A;
00036   int i;
00037 
00038   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00039     q[i] += 3*(1.0-1.0/A)* (X->rho[i]*X->rho[i]-X->rho2)* X->Q;
00040 }
00041 
00042 
00043 static void ob_qoffdiag(const SlaterDet* Q,
00044                         const Gaussian*G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00045                         const GaussianAux* X, 
00046                         complex double q[3])
00047 {
00048   int A=Q->A;
00049   int i;
00050 
00051   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00052     q[i] += 3*(1.0-1.0/A)*X->rho[(i+1)%3]*X->rho[(i+2)%3]*X->Q;
00053 }
00054 
00055 
00056 static void tb_qdiag(const SlaterDet* Q,
00057                      const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00058                      const Gaussian* G3, const Gaussian* G4, 
00059                      const GaussianAux* X13, const GaussianAux* X24, 
00060                      complex double q[3])
00061 {
00062   int A=Q->A;
00063   int i;
00064 
00065   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00066     q[i] += (-6.0/A* X13->rho[i]*X24->rho[i] +
00067               2.0/A* cvec3mult(X13->rho, X24->rho))* X13->Q* X24->Q;
00068 }
00069 
00070 
00071 static void tb_qoffdiag(const SlaterDet* Q,
00072                         const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00073                         const Gaussian* G3, const Gaussian* G4, 
00074                         const GaussianAux* X13, const GaussianAux* X24, 
00075                         complex double q[3])
00076 {
00077   int A=Q->A;
00078   int i;
00079 
00080   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00081     q[i] += -3.0/A*(X13->rho[(i+1)%3]*X24->rho[(i+2)%3]+
00082                     X13->rho[(i+2)%3]*X24->rho[(i+1)%3])* X13->Q* X24->Q;
00083 }

00085 
00086 static void gob_mainaxes(quadrupolepara* qpar,
00087                          const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2,
00088                          const GaussianAux* X, const gradGaussianAux* dX,
00089                          complex double* q2, gradGaussian* dq2)
00090 {
00091   int A=qpar->A;
00092   double* q=qpar->q;
00093   int i, k;
00094   complex double merr;
00095 
00096   for (i=0; i<3; i++) {
00097     
00098     merr = 3*(1.0-1.0/A)*X->rho[(i+1)%3]*X->rho[(i+2)%3];
00099       
00100     *q2 += 2*q[i]* merr *X->Q;
00101 
00102     for (k=0; k<2; k++)
00103       dq2->chi[k] +=  2*q[i]* merr* dX->dQ.chi[k];
00104     dq2->a += 2*q[i]*
00105       (3*(1.0-1.0/A)*(dX->drho.a[(i+1)%3]*X->rho[(i+2)%3]+
00106                       X->rho[(i+1)%3]*dX->drho.a[(i+2)%3])*X->Q+
00107        merr* dX->dQ.a);
00108     dq2->b[(i+1)%3] += 2*q[i]*
00109       3*(1.0-1.0/A)*dX->drho.b*X->rho[(i+2)%3]*X->Q;
00110     dq2->b[(i+2)%3] += 2*q[i]*
00111       3*(1.0-1.0/A)*X->rho[(i+1)%3]*dX->drho.b*X->Q;
00112     for (k=0; k<3; k++) 
00113       dq2->b[k] += 2*q[i]* merr* dX->dQ.b[k];
00114   }
00115 }

00117 
00118 static void gtb_mainaxes(quadrupolepara* qpar,
00119                          const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2,
00120                          const Gaussian* G3, const Gaussian* G4,
00121                          const GaussianAux* X13, const GaussianAux* X24,
00122                          const gradGaussianAux* dX13,
00123                          complex double* q2, gradGaussian* dq2)
00124 {
00125   int A=qpar->A;
00126   double* q=qpar->q;
00127   int i, k;
00128   complex double merr;
00129 
00130   for (i=0; i<3; i++) {
00131 
00132     merr = -3.0/A* (X13->rho[(i+1)%3]*X24->rho[(i+2)%3]+
00133                     X13->rho[(i+2)%3]*X24->rho[(i+1)%3]);
00134       
00135     *q2 += 2*q[i]* merr* X13->Q* X24->Q;
00136 
00137     for (k=0; k<2; k++)
00138       dq2->chi[k] +=  2*q[i]* merr* dX13->dQ.chi[k]* X24->Q;
00139     dq2->a += 2*q[i]*
00140       (-3.0/A*(dX13->drho.a[(i+1)%3]*X24->rho[(i+2)%3] +
00141                dX13->drho.a[(i+2)%3]*X24->rho[(i+1)%3])* X13->Q* X24->Q + 
00142        merr* dX13->dQ.a* X24->Q);
00143     dq2->b[(i+1)%3] += 2*q[i]*
00144       (-3.0/A)*(dX13->drho.b* X24->rho[(i+2)%3] +
00145                 dX13->drho.b* X24->rho[(i+3)%3])* X13->Q* X24->Q;
00146     for (k=0; k<3; k++) 
00147         dq2->b[k] += 2*q[i]* merr* dX13->dQ.b[k]* X24->Q;
00148   }
00149 }

00151 
00152 static void gob_qbeta2(quadrupolepara* qpar,
00153                        const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2,
00154                        const GaussianAux* X, const gradGaussianAux* dX,
00155                        complex double* beta2, gradGaussian* dbeta2)
00156 {
00157   int A=qpar->A;
00158   double* q=qpar->q;
00159   int i, k;
00160   complex double merr;
00161 
00162   for (i=0; i<3; i++) {
00163     
00164     merr = (1.0-1.0/A)*(3*X->rho[i]*X->rho[i] - X->rho2);
00165       
00166     *beta2 += 2*q[i]* merr *X->Q;
00167 
00168     for (k=0; k<2; k++)
00169       dq2->chi[k] +=  2*q[i]* merr* dX->dQ.chi[k];
00170     dq2->a += 2*q[i]*
00171       ((1.0-1.0/A)*(3*dX->drho.a[i]*X->rho[i] - dX->drho2.a)*X->Q+
00172        merr* dX->dQ.a);
00173     dq2->b[i] += 2*q[i]*
00174       (1.0-1.0/A)*(6*dX->drho.b*X->rho[i] - dX->drho2.b[i])*X->Q;
00175     for (k=0; k<3; k++) 
00176       dq2->b[k] += 2*q[i]* merr* dX->dQ.b[k];
00177   }
00178 }

00180 
00181 static void gtb_beta2(quadrupolepara* qpar,
00182                       const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2,
00183                       const Gaussian* G3, const Gaussian* G4,
00184                       const GaussianAux* X13, const GaussianAux* X24,
00185                       const gradGaussianAux* dX13,
00186                       complex double* beta2, gradGaussian* dbeta2)
00187 {
00188   int A=qpar->A;
00189   double* q=qpar->q;
00190   int i, k;
00191   complex double merr;
00192 
00193   for (i=0; i<3; i++) {
00194 
00195     merr = -6.0/A* X13->rho[i]*X24->rho[i] + 
00196             2.0/A* cvec3mult(X13->rho, X24->rho);
00197       
00198     *beta2 += 2*q[i]* merr* X13->Q* X24->Q;
00199 
00200     for (k=0; k<2; k++)
00201       dq2->chi[k] +=  2*q[i]* merr* dX13->dQ.chi[k]* X24->Q;
00202     dq2->a += 2*q[i]*
00203       (-6.0/A*dX13->drho.a[i]*X24->rho[i] +
00204         2.0/A*cvec3mult(dX13->drho.a, X24->rho))* X13->Q* X24->Q + 
00205        merr* dX13->dQ.a* X24->Q);
00206     dq2->b[(i+1)%3] += 2*q[i]*
00207       (-3.0/A)*(dX13->drho.b* X24->rho[(i+2)%3] +
00208                 dX13->drho.b* X24->rho[(i+3)%3])* X13->Q* X24->Q;
00209     for (k=0; k<3; k++) 
00210         dq2->b[k] += 2*q[i]* merr* dX13->dQ.b[k]* X24->Q;
00211   }
00212 }

00215 
00216 #define SQR(x) (x)*(x)
00217 
00218 void calcConstraintMainAxes(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00219                             double* q2)
00220 {
00221   double qijone[3], qijtwo[3], qsq = 0.0;
00222   int i;
00223   OneBodyOperator op_ob_qij = {dim: 3, opt: 1, par: Q, me: ob_qoffdiag};
00224   TwoBodyOperator op_tb_qij = {dim: 3, opt: 1, par: Q, me: tb_qoffdiag};
00225 
00226 
00227   calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, &op_ob_qij, qijone);
00228   calcSlaterDetTBME(Q, X, &op_tb_qij, qijtwo);
00229 
00230   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00231     qsq += SQR(qijone[i]+qijtwo[i]);
00232 
00233   *q2 = qsq;
00234 }
00235 
00236 
00237 void calcgradConstraintMainAxes(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X,
00238                                 const gradSlaterDetAux* dX,
00239                                 gradSlaterDet* dq2)
00240 {
00241   double qijone[3], qijtwo[3];
00242   int i;
00243   quadrupolepara qpar;
00244 
00245   OneBodyOperator op_ob_qij = {dim: 3, opt: 1, par: Q, me: ob_offdiag};
00246   TwoBodyOperator op_tb_qij = {dim: 3, opt: 1, par: Q, me: tb_offdiag};
00247 
00248 
00249   calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, &op_ob_qij, qijone);
00250   calcSlaterDetTBME(Q, X, &op_tb_qij, qijtwo);
00251 
00252   q2par.A = Q->A;
00253   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00254     q2par.q[i] = qijone[i]+qijtwo[i];
00255 
00256   gradOneBodyOperator gop_ob_q2 = {opt: 1, par: &q2par, me: gob_mainaxes};
00257   gradTwoBodyOperator gop_tb_q2 = {opt: 1, par: &q2par, me: gtb_mainaxes};
00258 
00259 
00260   calcgradSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, dX, &gop_ob_q2, dq2);
00261   calcgradSlaterDetTBME(Q, X, dX, &gop_tb_q2, dq2);
00262 }

00264 
00265 void calcConstraintQbeta2(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00266                           double* beta2)
00267 {
00268   double qone[3], qtwo[3], qsq = 0.0;
00269   int i;
00270   OneBodyOperator op_ob_q = {dim: 3, opt: 1, par: Q, me: ob_qdiag};
00271   TwoBodyOperator op_tb_q = {dim: 3, opt: 1, par: Q, me: tb_qdiag};
00272 
00273 
00274   calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, &op_ob_q, qone);
00275   calcSlaterDetTBME(Q, X, &op_tb_q, qtwo);
00276 
00277   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00278     qsq += SQR(qone[i]+qtwo[i]);
00279 
00280   *beta = qsq;
00281 }

00284 void calcgradConstraintQbeta2(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X,
00285                               const gradSlaterDetAux* dX,
00286                               gradSlaterDet* dbeta2)
00287 {
00288   double qone[3], qtwo[3];
00289   int i;
00290   quadrupolepara qpara;
00291 
00292   OneBodyOperator op_ob_q = {dim: 3, opt: 1, par: Q, me: ob_offdiag};
00293   TwoBodyOperator op_tb_q = {dim: 3, opt: 1, par: Q, me: tb_offdiag};
00294 
00295 
00296   calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, &op_ob_q, qone);
00297   calcSlaterDetTBME(Q, X, &op_tb_q, qtwo);
00298 
00299   qpara.A = Q->A;
00300   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00301     qpara.q[i] = qone[i]+qtwo[i];
00302 
00303   gradOneBodyOperator gop_ob_qbeta2 = {opt: 1, par: &qpara, me: gob_qbeta2};
00304   gradTwoBodyOperator gop_tb_qbeta2 = {opt: 1, par: &qpara, me: gtb_qbeta2};
00305 
00306 
00307   calcgradSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, dX, &gop_ob_qbeta2, dbeta2);
00308   calcgradSlaterDetTBME(Q, X, dX, &gop_tb_qbeta2, dbeta2);
00309 }
